title: Frontend
description: Learn the essentials of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, then advance your skills with React and GitHub. Perfect for building a strong foundation in frontend development.

title: Advance Frontend
description: Build on the Frontend Mastery course by diving into TypeScript, Next.js, SSR, and React + Vite. Gain advanced skills and learn website optimization techniques to create high-performance web applications.

title: Full-stack
description: Master the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to become a versatile full-stack developer. This course covers everything from frontend to backend, equipping you with the skills to build complete web applications.
